sections.MISSION:
1st Squadron, 2d Cavalry Regiment conducts M4/M249 Qualification on the 26 and 29 AUG 2024 at RG 101 and RG 102 to maintain proficiency on the M4/M249.
Commanderâ€™s
sections.PURPOSE: of this range is to provide Soldiers an opportunity to conduct a zero and qualification on the M4 and M249, ensuring unit readiness and preparation for future operations.
sections.KEY TASKS:
Conduct M4/M249 PMI before zero and qualification Conduct zero and M4/M249 Table V
Conduct M4/M249 Table VI qualification
sections.END STATE:
Soldiers conduct refresher training on their primary weapon system and successfully qualify on Table VI.
Training Objectives
Conduct M4/M249 PMI
Conduct Zero and M4/M249 Table V Conduct M4/M249 Table VI
Retrain and Refire as Needed
Every Attending Soldier Qualifies
